# Project Statement of Work
See [this](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1K-3V3Acfeoyc5VvcPNnfsFkUq37fgMQEOSmR3_yGENA/edit?usp=sharing). Also see the separate rmd and md file on the OSPC agreement.

The primary goals of this project are to (1) adapt and extend methods and tools developed in previous incubator projects, allowing us to develop state-specific income tax microdata files from the existing IRS SOI national Public Use File (PUF), and (2) develop at least one preliminary file for one state.


# Yimeng's Project Statement of Work
> Augment Boydâ€™s current project in which he is developing methods for creating a single state microdata tax file, in two ways: (a) rigorously compare file quality under several different approaches under investigation, and (b) port the approach that produces the best results from R to Python so that it can readily be integrated with TaxData.

xvalues <- readRDS(here::here("results", "NY_x.rds"))

nystats <- readRDS(here::here("data", paste0("hist2_targets", 2017, ".rds"))) %>%
  filter(stabbr=="NY")

nystats <- readRDS(here::here("data", "targets_all.rds")) %>%
  filter(stabbr=="NY")


compvars <- c("E00100", "E00200", "E05800")

tab <- comp %>%
  select(RECID, AGI_STUB, weight_state, compvars) %>%
  group_by(AGI_STUB) %>%
  summarise_at(vars(compvars), list(A=~sum(. * weight_state), N=~sum(weight_state * (. != 0)))) %>%
  pivot_longer(-AGI_STUB) %>%
  mutate(name=case_when(str_sub(name, -1) == "A" ~ paste0("A", str_sub(name, 2, 6)),
                        str_sub(name, -1) == "N" ~ paste0("N", str_sub(name, 2, 6)))) %>%
  left_join(nystats %>% select(name=h2vname, AGI_STUB, target, table_desc))


f <- function(vname) {
  scale <- ifelse(str_sub(vname, 1, 1)=="A", 1e9, 1)
  
  digs <- c(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 1)
  if (str_sub(vname, 1, 1)=="N") digs <- c(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1)
  
  tab %>% 
    filter(name==vname) %>%
    arrange(AGI_STUB) %>% 
    adorn_totals() %>%
    mutate(calc=value / scale,
           target=target / scale,
           diff=calc - target,
           pdiff=diff / target * 100) %>%
    select(AGI_STUB, name, table_desc, target, calc, diff, pdiff) %>%
    kable(digits=digs, format.args = list(big.mark=","), format="rst")
}

f("A00100")
f("A00200")
f("A05800")
f("N00100")
f("N00200")
f("N05800")



make_flex <- function(var, df, scale, htext){
  tabdf <- df %>%
    filter(name==var) %>%
    mutate(sum=sum / scale) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from=ftype, values_from=sum) %>%
    mutate(diff=syn - puf,
           pdiff=diff / puf * 100)
  
  ft <- tabdf %>%
    flextable(col_keys = c("agirange", 
                         "separator1",
                         "puf", "syn", "diff",
                         "separator2",
                         "pdiff")) %>%
  set_header_labels(agirange="AGI range",
                    puf = "Enhanced\nPUF",
                    syn = "Synthetic\nfile",
                    diff="Difference",
                    pdiff="% Difference") %>%
  add_header_row(values=c("", "", htext, "", ""), colwidths=c(1, 1, 3, 1, 1)) %>%
  align(i = 1, j = NULL, align = "center", part = "header") %>%
  colformat_num(j = c("puf", "syn", "diff"),
                big.mark=",", digits = 1, na_str = "N/A") %>%
  colformat_num(j = c("pdiff", "pdiff"),
                big.mark=",", digits = 1, na_str = "N/A") %>%
  width(j= ~ agirange, width=3) %>%
  width(j = ~ puf + syn + diff + pdiff, width=1.5) %>%
  width(j = ~ separator1 + separator2, width = .3) %>%
  height_all(part = "header", height = .4) %>%
  height_all(part = "body", height = .4) %>%
  # now control the themes # theme_booktabs() %>%
  border_remove() %>%
  hline(i=1, j=~puf, border = fp_border(width = 1), part = "header") %>%
  hline_bottom(j= ~ agirange + puf + syn + diff + pdiff, border = fp_border(width = 1), part = "header") %>%
  hline(i=7, j= ~ agirange + puf + syn + diff + pdiff, border = fp_border(width = 1), part = "body") %>%
  fontsize(size = 20, part = "all") %>%
  fontsize(i=1, size = 20, part = "header")
  
  return(ft)  
}
